default.heading: Page unavailable
default.content: We are experiencing technical problems and the error has been reported. Try again in a few moments.

session_timeout.heading: Session timeout
session_timeout.content: Your session has timed out due to a long period of inactivity.

missing_location.heading: Location not chosen
missing_location.content: You must choose a location to create a new move.

disabled_location.heading: You cannot create a move from this location
disabled_location.content: Moves can only be created from active locations.

not_found.heading: Page not found
not_found.content: If you entered a web address check it was correct.

missing_prereq.heading: Journey expired
missing_prereq.content_create_a_move: You can create a new move or view upcoming moves from the dashboard.

tampered_with.heading: This form has been tampered with
tampered_with.content: Try to reload the page and submit the form again in a few moments.

unauthorized.heading: You donâ€™t have permission to view this page
unauthorized.content: If you think you should have access please contact the support team.

unauthorized_bad_device.heading: Access to Book a Secure Move is not permitted from personal devices
unauthorized_bad_device.content: This incident has been reported. If you think you should have access from this device please contact the support team.

unauthorized_off_network.heading: Access to Book a Secure Move is not permitted from this network
unauthorized_off_network.content: This incident has been reported. If you think you should have access from this network please contact the support team.

unprocessable_entity.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
unprocessable_entity.content: Contact the helpdesk on 0800 917 5148 or #6598 from inside an establishment and quote the reference number below.

outage.heading: Sorry, Book a secure move is unavailable
outage.alternative: You can still use other services on DPS.
outage.otherwise: While Book a secure move is unavailable, you should:

nomis_status_message: The problem may be related to NOMIS being unavailable.
